item.title: News
item.description: [2017] I became an active member of Statistics Queens Association in Carnegie Mellon University, a quite official, serious and professional Pittsburgh-based restaurant exploring group (referral-only) found by Yufei Yi from the acting major in School of Drama at CMU. [2019] I listen to New Pants when I am happy or unhappy. [2020] Let’s take more fresh air and finish more trails to stay healthy and calm! This year, my footprints in Pittsburgh suburb include .

item.title: Yue Li
item.description: XMin is the first Hugo theme I have designed. The original reason that I wrote it was I needed a minimal example of Hugo themes when I was writing the blogdown book. Basically I wanted a simple theme that supports a navigation menu, a home page, other single pages, lists of pages, blog posts, categories, tags, and RSS. That is all. Nothing fancy. In terms of CSS and JavaScript, I really want to keep them minimal.
